content:
I have completed the course on Building and Managing Resilient Teams by the University of Chicago via University of Chicago Professional Education.
The course had six modules:
Team Resilience Team Building Team Motivation Creating Effective Processes Managing Cross-Cultural Teams Keeping teams on track (long term success) See the certificate
See my post on LinkedIn
title: Building and Managing Resilient Teams

content:
I have completed the course on Leading Digital Transformation by the Massachusetts Institute of Technology via Massachusetts Institute of Technology Professional Education.
The course had 3 modules:
Cross-Cultural Communication Types of Cultures Stereotypes Communication Goals Leadership in the Digital Age Leadership vs Management Achieving Goals Types of Motivation Digital Transformation - The Big Picture Blockchain Cloud Computing Artificial Intelligence Internet of Things Cybersecurity See the certificate
summary: Massachusetts Institute of Technology Professional Education
title: Leading Digital Transformation
